pullRequest.title: Move GeoJSON Types from Azure Core to Azure Core Experimental
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR moves the GeoJSON types from Azure Core to Azure Core Experimental. In addition to moving these classes Azure Search is updating/removing its use of the GeoJSON types.

commit.message: Move GeoJSON types from Azure Core to Azure Core Experimental

nodes.bodyText: There's a com.azure.core.experimental.serializer too. Maybe we should put this in com.azure.core.experimental.spatial.serializer?

commit.message: Remove PointGeometry use from Search APIs, commented out testing using class
